DetDescr/test/DefaultDetectorID_test.cxx

00001 // LDMX
00002 #include "DetDescr/DefaultDetectorID.h"
00003 
00004 // STL
00005 #include <bitset>
00006 #include <iostream>
00007 #include <stdexcept>
00008 
00009 using ldmx::IDField;
00010 using ldmx::DefaultDetectorID;
00011 using ldmx::DetectorID;
00012 
00013 int main(int, const char* argv[])  {
00014 
00015     std::cout << "Hello DefaultDetectorID test!" << std::endl;
00016 
00017     DetectorID* detID = new DefaultDetectorID();
00018 
00019     int layer = 10;
00020     int subdet = 2;
00021 
00022     detID->setFieldValue("layer", layer);
00023     detID->setFieldValue("subdet", subdet);
00024     detID->pack();
00025 
00026     DetectorID::RawValue rawVal = detID->getRawValue();
00027     std::bitset<32> rawValBits = rawVal;
00028     std::cout << "rawValBits: " << rawValBits << std::endl;
00029 
00030     detID->setRawValue(rawVal);
00031     const DetectorID::FieldValueList& fieldValues = detID->unpack();
00032 
00033     std::cout << "subdet: " << fieldValues[0] << std::endl;
00034     std::cout << "layer: " << fieldValues[1] << std::endl;
00035 
00036     if (fieldValues[0] != subdet) {
00037         throw std::runtime_error("Wrong value for subdet: " + subdet);
00038     }
00039 
00040     if (fieldValues[1] != layer) {
00041         throw std::runtime_error("Wrong value for layer: " + layer);
00042     }
00043 
00044     delete detID;
00045 
00046     std::cout << "Bye DefaultDetectorID test!" << std::endl;
00047 }
